<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns the group leader for the given unit or group. For dead units, objNull is returned.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Object]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''leader''' unitName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value>unitName: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value><code>[[leader]] [[group]] [[player]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>==</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[leader]] [[player]] </code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value><code>_GroupLeader <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[leader]] ([[group]] ([[vehicle]] [[player]])) </code>

</value></part><part><name>x3 </name>=<value><code>_UnitLeader <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[leader]] [[player]] </code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[formationLeader]], [[formLeader]], [[isFormationLeader]], [[selectLeader]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
